text: Emilia Rydberg, also known as Emilia Mitiku or more simply Emilia (born 5 January 1978, Stockholm, Sweden)Emilia Rydberg Charts, Allmusic is a Swedish pop and soul singer,Emilia Rydberg mostly known for her worldwide hit single, "Big Big World".Billboard. Google Books (12 December 1998).
